import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { AutoCom } from '../../autoCom'; import TickerSearchComp from '../tickerSearchComp'; function SupportResisCard() { var Today = new Date(); let year = Today.getFullYear() let month = (Today.getMonth() + 1) - 1 const date = 1 if(month === 0){ year -= 1 month = 12 } var TodayDate = year.toString() + "-" + month.toString().padStart(2, '0') + "-" + date.toString().padStart(2, '0') const autocom = AutoCom.AutoComList; const [ticker, setTicker] = useState("") const [startDate, setStartDate] = useState((year - 5).toString() + "-01-01"); const [endDate, setEndDate] = useState(""); const [method, setMethod] = useState("method1"); const [maLen, setMaLen] = useState(20); const [maType, setMaType] = useState("sma"); const [condition, setCondition] = useState("便宜價"); const conditionSwitch = { "method1" : [ ["crossResistance", "突破天花板線"], ["crossSupport", "突破地板線"] ], "method2" : [ ["crossSupport", "突破地板線"] ], "method3" : [ ["crossSupport1", "突破地板線1%"], ["crossSupport5", "突破地板線5%"] ] } const submit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() } return ( <>
setStartDate(e.target.value)} max = { TodayDate } value = { startDate }>
setEndDate(e.target.value)} min = { year.toString() + "-" + (Today.getMonth() + 1).toString().padStart(2, '0') + "-" + Today.getDate().toString().padStart(2, '0') }>
); } export default SupportResisCard;
